{{cpp/io/basic_spanbuf/title|swap}}
{{cpp/io/basic_spanbuf/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++23|
void swap( basic_spanbuf&amp; rhs );
}}

Swaps the state of {{c|*this}} and {{c|rhs}}.

Calls {{c|std::basic_streambuf&lt;Char, Traits&gt;::swap(rhs)}}, swaps the open mode of {{c|*this}} and {{c|rhs}}, and then makes them use the underlying buffer of each other.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|rhs|another {{tt|basic_stringbuf}}}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)

{{cpp/impldef exception}}

===Notes===
This function is called automatically when swapping stream objects, it is rarely necessary to call it directly.
